short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Turn every new tab into a fan experience. Explore curated content or add your own.
short.de: Verwandle jeden neuen Tab in ein Erlebnis. Entdecke spannende Inhalte oder f√ºge Deine eigenen hinzu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Watch your own fotos, videos or even YouTube-URLs in your browser tab! 
So everytime you open a browser tab feel happy because of your kids fotos, beloved music,...
Optional, make all your uploaded contents a slideshow on a monitor.

‚ù§Ô∏è You have lovely pictures and videos from holidays, baby, kids? Add your exciting and emotional pictures, videos or YouTube-Videos into the extension (content is still save only on your Computer and not transferred) to watch every time you open a new browser tab. Feel happy to be remembered to Highlights in your live or if you want to use videos to motivate yourself! 
 
üåé Also discover our pre-selected pictures, videos and livestreams. Watch new great and inspiring places around the world (live animals, beaches, cities, trains, rivers, etc.) or YouTube-Channels from celebrities, music bands, sports clubs, etc. 
  
‚öôÔ∏è Features in New-Tab:
‚úÖ Google search bar
‚úÖ Navigate through the content.
‚úÖ Like the things you want to see more often or dislike them so they don't show again
‚úÖ Add your own pictures, videos and even create photo and video collages. 
‚úÖ ...many more features that we will publish regularly....

In these 3 steps, you'll activate fan tabs and see content you love in every new tab:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Click "add to Chrome".
2Ô∏è‚É£ Click on "Add extension".
3Ô∏è‚É£ Click on "keep".
 
‚ö†Ô∏è Notice:
We do not collect any unauthorized data and only require the browser permission so that the livestreams are displayed optimally for you. If you want to know more about this, feel free to check out our privacy policy (live-tabs.com/priacy-policy).
